text: tum usake siva jinakee bhee bandagee karate ho ve to bas nire naam hain jo tumane rakh chhode hai aur tumhaare baap-daada ne. unake lie allaah ne koee pramaan nahin utaara. satta aur adhikaar to bas allaah ka hai. usane aadesh diya hai ki usake siva kisee kee bandagee na karo. yahee seedha, sachcha deen (dharm) hain, kintu adhikatar log nahin jaanate
